altername_name: Oogami Ichirou Funtou-ki: Sakura Taisen Kayou Show Beni Tokage yori
name: Ogami Ichiro Funtouki: Sakura Taisen Kayou Show "Benitokage" Yori
overview: Ogami Ichiro Funtouki: Sakura Taisen Kayou Show "Benitokage" Yori (大神一郎奮闘記～サクラ大戦歌謡ショウ『紅蜥蜴』より～) is an adventure game for the Sega Dreamcast. It is a story about the actors who took part in the various Sakura Taisen stage shows at the time.
